body: Literally just had to get CCL on both back legs of my bully in the fall. It sucks and recovery is long, but shes almost 100% again now. Keep your head up bud!

Thank you I'll look into that. Yes his other knee is already showing signs of the CCL giving way. Im saving a portion of each paycheck for the future surgery when its needed. Ill try to wrap it like you mentioned. Thank you so much!
